title: Mobile-Based Elementary Chemistry Experiment Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: General chemistry theory and understanding of basic laboratory procedures
context.additional_context: Improving chemical experimentation skills through mobile learning in environments with insufficient laboratory infrastructure.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce chemical experiment procedures with over 80% accuracy using a mobile learning platform
Learners can predict and explain chemical reaction results with over 75% accuracy through virtual lab simulations
Learners can improve their ability to correct experimental errors by over 50% through weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
